result.name: results-of-aquanet-mod-for-projecting-the-economic-burden-of-the-world-organisation-for-animal-
result.notes:
The outputs of the Aquaculture Network Disease Model (AquaNet-Mod), predicting 
the epidemiological and economic burden of viral haemorrhagic septicaemia in 
English and Welsh salmonid farms under various disease control scenarios.

Included are outputs of the AquaNet-Mod from FY22-23. The code for generating 
these outputs can be found at the `aquanet`_ and `aquanet-mod`_ GitHub 
repositories.

For the summary data, there are .csv files which give the epidemic size, 
duration and cost for each simulation. For the epidemic size and duration, the 
files also give an indication as to whether an epidemic died out or timed out.

The summary data contains five zipped output sub-files:


(  1.)scenarios - Contains the outputs of disease control scenarios described 
      in Guilder et al. (in prep) and Kennerley et al. (in prep).
(  2.)fishery_cull - Contains the outputs of the baseline disease control 
      scenario, with different proportions of fisheries able to cull.
(  3.)fallow_period - Contains the outputs of the baseline disease control 
      scenario, with different lengths of fallow period.
(  4.)n_sims - Contains the outputs of baseline disease control scenario, with 
      a different number of simulations. Note: doesn’t contain economic data.
(  5.)sensitivity_tests - Contains the outputs of model sensitivity tests 
      described in Guilder et al. (in prep).


.. _`aquanet`:
    https://github.com/CefasRepRes/aquanet

.. _`aquanet-mod`:
    https://github.com/CefasRepRes/aquanet-mod
